content:
To normalize the provided profile data according to the specified guidelines, I'll follow the normalization instructions for each relevant field. Let's start by processing the input profile.

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "VP of Eng.",
  "location": "SF Bay Area",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Project Mgmt",
    "Data Analysis"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions, Inc.",
      "title": "VP, Engineering",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech LLC",
      "title": "Sr. Software Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Palo Alto, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
  "location": "San Francisco Bay Area, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "Python",
    "Project Management",
    "Data Analysis"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions, Inc.",
      "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech LLC",
      "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "Palo Alto, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Expanded VP to Vice President; Standardized SF Bay Area to full location; Expanded Eng. and Mgmt abbreviations"
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
1. **Title Normalization**: 
   - "VP of Eng." was expanded to "Vice President of Engineering".
   - "Project Mgmt" was expanded to "Project Management".
   - "Sr. Software Eng." was expanded to "Senior Software Engineer".

2. **Location Normalization**:
   - "SF Bay Area" was expanded to "San Francisco Bay Area, California, United States".
   - "San Francisco" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
   - "Palo Alto, CA" was expanded to "Palo Alto, California, United States".

3. **Date Normalization**:
   - Converted "March 2018" to "2018-03".
   - Converted "June 2015" to "2015-06".
   - Converted "February 2018" to "2018-02".

4. **Company Names**:
   - "Tech Solutions, Inc." and "Innovatech LLC" were already in proper format.

5. **Normalization Notes**:
   - Added notes to explain significant changes, such as expanding abbreviations and standardizing locations.
